decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.itemTypes

Class EquipablePlayerItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.itemBase.PlayerItem
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.itemTypes.EquipablePlayerItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NyanBoots

    public class EquipablePlayerItem
extends PlayerItem
    Created by P3TE on 6/08/2014. The item class for equipable items. This class extends the basic Item.

      • addStatEffect

        public void addStatEffect(StatEffect effect)
        Adds a stat effect to the item. If there is a current wielder, the effect will be give immediately.
        Parameters:
        effect - - The effect to add.

      • removeStatEffect

        public boolean removeStatEffect(StatEffect effect)
        Removes an effect from the item. If there is a current wielder, the effect will be canceled.
        Parameters:
        effect - - The effect to remove.
        Returns:
        boolean: True - The effect existed, and is removed. Fakse - The effect was not part of this item.

      • getOccupiedSlot

        Check whether or not an item can fit within a character slot.

        (boolean) whether or not an item can fit within a character slot.
